name: Resistance
description: If you have Resistance to a damage type, damage of that type is halved against you (round down). Resistance is applied only once to an instance of damage. See also chapter 1 ("Damage and Healing").

sourceRef.file: docs/sources/phb2024/rules-glossary/13-Rules Glossary - Player's Handbook - Dungeons & Dragons - Sources - D&D Beyond.pdf
